name: Ticky Treats
description:
Ticky Treats

Tick...Tick..Tick...

Just little local-2P Trick-or-Treat Arcade-Mashup, made in a week for Spooktober Jam 2021.

Instructions:

- Collect the most treats to win!

- Interact with highlighted doors to get treats and new minions (but don't get caught while waiting!)

- Run over other minions to kill them and get their part of the candy

- Drop minions like bombs to kill other minions and drain the other teams candy

- Bomb ghosts and collect their remains to get new minions

- Stay away from ghost-leaders and their trail!

Controls:

P1: Move: WASD // Drop Bomb: Space // Interact: E

P2: Move: Arrows // Drop Bomb: P // Interact: O

Credits:

Art/Animation - Jannis Steffen

SFX - Viktor Kraus

Music - A Boy With A Balloon

Code - Micha Henry

Used free assets:

- Unity Particle Pack

- Fancy Footsteps by Vaxkun

- Apartment Door by Devden

- Canles by Alexandr Voevodov

- Wood Texture by Tim H.

- Old Medieval Chest by Artstudios3D

- Pumpkin by 3DFancy
